channel.title: demo on Yuanzhe Shi
channel.description: Recent content in demo on Yuanzhe Shi

item.title: Gallery
item.description: .grid { position: block; height: 100% } .item-content { z-index: 1; position: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; overflow: hidden; margin-top: -16px; margin-bottom: -16px; } .item-content img { display: block; border-radius: 6px; } .crop-image { left: -100%; right: -100%; top: -100%; bottom: -100%; object-fit: cover; } img{ transition: transform 0.25s ease-in-out, opacity 0.25s ease-in-out, filter 0.25s ease-in-out; } .item-content:hover img{ opacity: 0; transform: ; opacity: ; filter: ; } .
